title: Editing Rune Pages in Champion Select
body: Is there any chance of us getting to edit or make quick rune page changes during Champion select? We have the ability to change our mastery pages, but not our runes & with runes being a important part of our loadout, I've wondered why we don't have time to make any last minute changes to them along with masteries.

replies.body:
they said in a recent video they posted that they will implement that feature in the mid season, just wait.
plus the reason why runes you dont have to remake depending on champion (except specific strategies) and with there being so many runes, 30 seconds is not enough for an average player to create a new rune set.
the reason we are allowed to change masteries is because that champions in each catagory and role needs sepreate masteries, and with only 20 pages that aint gonna work. and theres only 30 points for you to use anyways unlike my "spend less time dead" or "extra exp" runes (yes i own those)

I honestly thought they were moving that & the whole Runes rework towards the end of the season. I'm a patient guy, so whether it's mid season or preseason, it won't bother me at all. Guess we'll have to wait & see.
Btw I also have exp. runes, nothing wrong with having those :)
